sections.title: Summary
data: I am a Senior Software Architect at TransNexus with experience designing, developing, deploying, and maintaining applications on AWS and Azure. My focus is on designing distributed microservice architectures for mission-critical, real-time applications. I am a frequent technical speaker on STIR/SHAKEN. I am an active contributor to the ATIS/SIP Forum IP-NNI task force and ATIS PTSC Non-IP Call Authentication task force.

detail.summary: Designed, developed, deployed, and maintained ClearIP
details: Provides toll-fraud prevention, robocall prevention, STIR/SHAKEN, and LCR with linear scalability using microservice architecture
Served as architect and lead developer on project
Developed distrubuted, stateless SIP server written in JavaScript using Node.js with Redis and Apache Kafka databases
Developed distrubuted, stateless RESTful API written in JavaScript using Sails.js and Node.js with MySQL and Druid databases
Developed web interface written in JavaScript using Ember.js, jQuery, and Bootstrap
Developed numerous supporting applications written in JavaScript using Node.js

detail.summary: Designed, developed, deployed, and maintained TransNexus Certificate Authority
details: Provides certificates for STIR/SHAKEN call authentication
Served as architect and lead developer on project
Developed distrubuted, stateless RESTful API written in JavaScript using Sails.js and Node.js with MySQL and DynamoDB databases
Developed web interface written in JavaScript using Ember.js, jQuery, and Bootstrap

detail.summary: Designed, developed, deployed, and maintained TransNexus Call Placement Service
details: Provides a call placement service for out-of-band STIR/SHAKEN call authentication
Served as architect and lead developer on project
Developed distrubuted, stateless RESTful API written in JavaScript using Express.js and Node.js with Redis database

detail.summary: Designed, developed, deployed, and maintained TransNexus Administration Portal
details: Provides web interface and API for managing customers' software
Served as architect and lead developer on project
Developed distrubuted, stateless RESTful API written in JavaScript using Sails.js and Node.js with MySQL database
Developed web interface written in JavaScript using Ember.js, jQuery, and Bootstrap

detail.summary: Designed and developed new interface for NexOSS
details: Replaced existing Java web application with JavaScript web application
Developed RESTful API written in JavaScript using Sails.js and Node.js
Developed web interface written in JavaScript using Ember.js, jQuery, and Bootstrap

detail: Worked on small team to develop and test prototype for use in future cockpit of automated vehicles
Developed GUI to monitor and control prototype in real time for dynamic simulator testing using MATLAB
Created electrical system and software for controlling linear actuator with pulse width modulation using C++
Created custom PCB Arduino shield and software for recording feedback with force sensitive resistors using C++
Developed software for first dual core jet engine controller using SCADE qualified C code generator
Created automated tool for gathering and analyzing licensing server data using Perl, VBA, and batch
Created project tracking system to quickly identify problematic deadlines using VBA
Ember Simple Auth extension for token based authentication including JSON web tokens written in JavaScript using Ember.js
Node.js library for reliable and distributed batch message processing using Redis written in JavaScript
Arduino library for fast and simultaneous operations to Arduino I/O pins using port manipulation written in C++
Tool for creating HTML and PDF resumes from JSON data and HTML layouts written in JavaScript using jQuery and Handlebars
